articles.title: Pound and euro 'unbuyable', says French bank - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: Britain’s fresh political crisis and the threat of Russia cutting off energy supplies to Europe have rendered the pound and the euro “unbuyable”, a top analyst has said.
articles.content:
Good morning. 
It's a baptism of fire for new Chancellor Nadhim Zahawi, who's been grilled on his plans for the UK economy on his first day in the job.

articles.title: Smuggling operation sent thousands of people across Channel illegally in small boats - The Guardian
articles.description: Police in five European countries uncover criminal network believed to have smuggled 10,000 people in last 18 months
articles.content:
A smuggling operation that police believe illegally sent 10,000 people across the Channel over the last 18 months has been uncovered after a coordinated operation across five European countries.

articles.title: Panama reports country's first monkeypox case - Reuters.com
articles.description: Panama registered its first case of monkeypox in a resident who was infected after being in contact with tourists from Europe, Panama's health ministry said Tuesday.
articles.content:
PANAMA CITY, July 5 (Reuters) - Panama registered its first case of monkeypox in a resident who was infected after being in contact with tourists from Europe, Panama's health ministry said Tuesday.
